doc.previous: Copernicus formulated a heliocentric model of the solar system unlike the geocentric model of Ptolemy's Almagest.
doc.after: Galileo made innovative use of experiment and mathematics. However his persecution began after Pope Urban VIII blessed Galileo to write about the Copernican system. Galileo had used arguments from the Pope and put them in the voice of the simpleton in the work "Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems" which caused great offense to him.[28]
